Large Party Catering

Basic Kitchen’s catering makes it easy to serve fresh, seasonal food for a big crowd. Please use the form below to submit an inquiry. Someone from our team will be in touch soon!

Private Events & Large Parties

We offer for groups of 12-18 and we also offer for larger groups. To inquire about a large party or private event offering, please use the form below to submit a request. Someone from our team will be in touch soon!
